ClusterIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the source cluster to copy snapshots from. Constraints: Must be the valid name of an existing cluster that does not already have cross-region snapshot copy enabled.

DestinationRegion.description: The destination region that you want to copy snapshots to. Constraints: Must be the name of a valid region. For more information, see Regions and Endpoints in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

RetentionPeriod.description: The number of days to retain automated snapshots in the destination region after they are copied from the source region. Default: 7. Constraints: Must be at least 1 and no more than 35.

SnapshotCopyGrantName.description: The name of the snapshot copy grant to use when snapshots of an AWS KMS-encrypted cluster are copied to the destination region.
